message: I'm excited to offer you this incredible product at a price that I think is a great value. I'm willing to sell it to you for $1200000.
I appreciate your offer, but I was thinking of a lower price. I'm willing to pay $1100000 for the product.
I understand you're looking to save some money, but I have to make a profit. I'm willing to meet you halfway, so I'll offer it to you for $1150000.
I appreciate your willingness to meet me halfway, but I'm still looking to save some more. I'm willing to pay $1100000 for the product.
